comments:
When running this code without LaunchConfiguration:

ILaunchManager manager = DebugPlugin.getDefault().getLaunchManager();
ISourceLocator locator = manager.newSourceLocator
("org.eclipse.jdt.launching.sourceLocator.JavaSourceLookupDirector");
launch = new Launch(null, launchMode, locator);
manager.addLaunch(launch);
vmRunner.run(newConf, launch, null);

I'm getting next NPE and console does not provide an output:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.console.ProcessConsoleManager.launchChanged
(ProcessConsoleManager.java:159)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager$LaunchNotifier.run
(LaunchManager.java:1401)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run
(InternalPlatform.java:616)
at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:747)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager$LaunchNotifier.notify
(LaunchManager.java:1420)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.fireUpdate
(LaunchManager.java:379)
at org.eclipse.debug.core.Launch.fireChanged(Launch.java:399)
at org.eclipse.debug.core.Launch.addProcess(Launch.java:362)
at org.eclipse.debug.core.model.RuntimeProcess.<init>(RuntimeProcess.java:114)
at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin.newProcess(DebugPlugin.java:537)
at org.eclipse.jdt.launching.AbstractVMRunner.newProcess
(AbstractVMRunner.java:110)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.launching.StandardVMRunner.run
(StandardVMRunner.java:252)
at org.eclipse.pollinate.runtime.launching.RuntimeRunner.run
(RuntimeRunner.java:92)

Fixed in ProcessConsoleManager (a launch does not have to have a launch 
configuration) - added null check.
